summary: A new book mod with books from great story writers from the Skyrim community.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE:
I have been very busy for the last couple if days/weeks so do not expect an update coming soon (one may be released though)


Hello I am a new modder, brandonpadres and here I have a mod which adds some stories about Tamriel (fan fiction, lore, etc.). I am very excited to see where this mod will go and hope you will enjoy it :D.

This mod is very lore friendly and should fit seamlessly into your game. If there is any format/grammar errors please tell me about it.

If you have a story that you would like me to do post a comment on here http://redd.it/200jtq

Books/Stories included:
Shining Ebony I-X

How to get each book:
Shining Ebony I-X
Find Stald in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. He is a Redguard merchant who only sells his items between 8 AM to 10 PM.

Planned:
-Add the Luck of the Blade Series, the Shade of Sorrow series, and the Daziin and the Dovahkiin series
-Create a library where there will be npc's and books that are purchasable (probably will come when I have somewhere around 100 books and yes I plan on having 100+ books)
If you want me to do something, request in the comments!

Known Bugs:
Stald sells things other than just books (I'm working on a fix for this.)

Author's Requests:
Anyone who would like to make textures for the book covers, please contact me!
author: brandonpadres

files.name: Books of Tamriel
files.changelogHtml:
Added books, Shining Ebony 4 and 5
Added a Chest that holds all of the books

files.name: NEWEST VERSION BOOKS OF TAMRIEL
files.changelogHtml:
Added Merchant that Sells all the books
Moved chest containing all books to the QASmoke cell (pretty much a cheat cell)
